name: Marcus Ichida
description: Marcus Ichida is a high-ranking member of theTyger Claws. Marcus and his fellow ganger,Jun Azegami, are the superiors ofHiromi Sato, another Tyger who runsCloudson the gang's behalf. The two go to Hiromi to have a meeting but are interrupted in the meeting byVandMaiko Maeda. Jun and Marcus are lectured by the pair on how Hiromi turned a blind eye toEvelyn Parkerwhen she was assaulted by Woodman and to all of his other abuses towards the dolls of Clouds. This can end in a bloodbath where Marcus is killed or Jun will impale Hiromi with a katana out of disgust. They can then parts ways with...
